com.maddox.sas1946.il2.util

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maddox.sas1946.il2.util.Reflection

  • public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    "Reflection" Class of the "SAS Common Utils"

    This Class is mainly used to gain access to fields and methods of other classes where the access modifier (private/protected/(none)/public) prohibits access to that field/method.

    Since:
    1.0.1
    Version:
    1.0.6
    Author:
    SAS~Storebror

      static java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Calls the Static Method "method" (with no arguments), the return value will be returned to the caller.
      static java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] params)
      Calls the Static Method "method" (with given arguments from "params"), the return value will be returned to the caller.
      static java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.Object[] params)
      Calls the Instance Method "method" which must exist in the inheritance chain of the Object "obj".

    • Method Detail

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                  java.lang.String methodName)
        Searches for the Instance Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be called (with no arguments) and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                  java.lang.String methodName,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] params)
        Searches for the Instance Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Class declaringClass,
                                                  java.lang.String methodName)
        Searches for the Static Method specified by "methodName" within the given Class "declaringClass".
        Once found, the method will be called (with no arguments) and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        declaringClass - The class where the Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Class declaringClass,
                                                  java.lang.String methodName,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] params)
        Searches for the Static Method specified by "methodName" within the given Class "declaringClass".
        Once found, the method will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        declaringClass - The class where the Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                  java.lang.Object obj,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] params)
        Calls the Instance Method "method" which must exist in the inheritance chain of the Object "obj".
        If the method exists, it will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Calls the Static Method "method" (with no arguments), the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • invokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] params)
        Calls the Static Method "method" (with given arguments from "params"), the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • getMethod

        public static final java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                       java.lang.String methodName)
        Searches for the Instance Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        Returns:
        The Method found
        Since:
        1.0.4

      • getMethod

        public static final java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                       java.lang.String methodName,
                                                       java.lang.Object[] params)
        Searches for the Instance Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:

      • genericInvokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                         java.lang.String methodName)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Object obj, String methodName)
        Searches for the Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be called (with no arguments) and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                         java.lang.String methodName,
                                                         java.lang.Object[] params)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Object obj, String methodName, Object[] params)
        Searches for the Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethodStatic

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethodStatic(java.lang.Class declaringClass,
                                                               java.lang.String methodName)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Class declaringClass, String methodName)
        Searches for the static Method specified by "methodName" within the given Class "declaringClass".
        Once found, the method will be called (with no arguments) and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        declaringClass - The class where the Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethodStatic

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethodStatic(java.lang.Class declaringClass,
                                                               java.lang.String methodName,
                                                               java.lang.Object[] params)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Class declaringClass, String methodName, Object[] params)
        Searches for the static Method specified by "methodName" within the given Class "declaringClass".
        Once found, the method will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        declaringClass - The class where the Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethod

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                         java.lang.Object obj,
                                                         java.lang.Object[] params)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Method method, Object obj, Object[] params)
        Calls the Method "method" which must exist in the inheritance chain of the Object "obj".
        If the method exists, it will be called (with given arguments from "params") and the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethodStatic

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethodStatic(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Method method)
        Calls the static Method "method" (with no arguments), the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericInvokeMethodStatic

        public static final java.lang.Object genericInvokeMethodStatic(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                               java.lang.Object[] params)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by invokeMethod(Method method, Object[] params)
        Calls the static Method "method" (with given arguments from "params"), the return value will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        method - The Method to invoke
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The return value of the Method
        Since:
        1.0.1

      • genericGetMethod

        public static final java.lang.reflect.Method genericGetMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                              java.lang.String methodName)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by getMethod(Object obj, String methodName)
        Searches for the Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        Once found, the method will be returned to the caller.

      • genericGetMethod

        public static final java.lang.reflect.Method genericGetMethod(java.lang.Object obj,
                                                              java.lang.String methodName,
                                                              java.lang.Object[] params)
        Deprecated. As of release 1.0.4, replaced by getMethod(Object obj, String methodName, Object[] params)
        Searches for the Method specified by "methodName" within the given Object "obj" back through it's inheritance chain.
        The parameter set of the method found must match the parameterset given in "params".
        Once found, the method will be returned to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - The instance Object where (or in which's inherited objects) the regarding Method resides in
        methodName - The name of the Method
        params - The arguments for calling the Method
        Returns:
        The Method found
        Since:
        1.0.1
